<template>
    <header :class="['top-bar', { 'top-bar--hidden': isHidden }]">
    <slot>Top Bar 内容</slot>
    </header>
</template>

<script>
    export default {
    name: 'TopBar',
    data() {
        return {
        lastScrollY: 0,
        isHidden: false
        }
    },
    mounted() {
        this.lastScrollY = window.scrollY
        window.addEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll)
    },
    beforeUnmount() {
      window.removeEventListener('scroll', this.handleScroll)
    },
    methods: {
      handleScroll() {
        const currentY = window.scrollY
        this.isHidden = currentY > this.lastScrollY && currentY > 50 // 向下滚动且滚动距离大于50时隐藏
        this.lastScrollY = currentY
      }
    }
  }
  </script>
  
  <style scoped>
  .top-bar {
    position: fixed;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    right: 0;
    height: 56px;
    background: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.05);
    z-index: 100;
    transition: transform 0.3s;
  }
  .top-bar--hidden {
    transform: translateY(-100%);
  }
  </style>
